name: Amalgamated Gemstone
description: Used in the Mystic Forge to create the Eternal Sands focus and to make Polish, used in precursor crafting.

name: Frostbitten Orichalcum Logging Axe
description:
Can harvest Ancient, Elder, and all lesser woods.
Provides a chance for snowflakes when gathering.

name: Platinum Mining Node
description: This activates a platinum mining node within your home instance for daily gathering.

name: Frostbitten Orichalcum Harvesting Sickle
description:
Used to harvest all plants.
Provides a chance for snowflakes when gathering.

name: Essence of Time
description: Used in the Mystic Forge to create the Eternal Sands focus.

name: Mordrem Troll Bladder
description:
Turn in to the cryptobotanist for extra bandit crests.
Double-click to locate.

name: Frostbitten Orichalcum Mining Pick
description:
Can harvest Orichalcum, Mithril, and all lesser metals.
Provides a chance for snowflakes when gathering.

name: Elder Wood Logging Node
description: This activates an elder wood logging node within your home instance for daily gathering.

description: Unlocks the ability for characters on your account to customize the way they send mail to other players and receive game mail.
